skillTree.localised_description: There are none more adept at metal-shaping than those who command the runes.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: With the power of Runic Magic at your side, there's little in this world or any other that can do to bring you low.
As a Slayer pursues his quarry, the Runesmith's thirst for knowledge is every bit as relentless, because only through understanding will we wipe the foe from the mountains once and for all.
There are some things that simply cannot be taught. You either know them or you don't; it's as simple as that.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The more runes you craft, the stronger and more powerful they – and you – will become; practice makes perfect, after all.
Upon the Anvil of Doom the rune weapons of legend are forged.

effects.description: Shared cooldown: -15% for all Master Rune Magic
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Oath & Steel"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Oath & Steel"

target_if: Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"

target_if: Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: The Dwarfs' natural anti-magic resistance is amplified to dampen the Winds of Magic.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -10
	(enemy armies in region)
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"

skillTree.localised_description: Invoking the Rune of Hearth & Home stirs a Dwarf's pride in his Hold, Clan and Ancestors.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Dawi Rune Magic is potent, and damned hard to defend against!
A Runesmith may "strike the runes" - an analogy for keeping them "hot", refusing to let them cool.

effects.description: Shared cooldown: -10% for all Rune Magic

skillTree.localised_description: The power of this rune undermines the armour worn by the enemies of the Dawi.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
This rune provides the Runesmith with resistance to flame.
Look at the wee wizards cower in their boots.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -10
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Casting spells in the presence of a Runesmith skilled enough to have mastered the use of this rune is risky to say the least.

effects.description:
Enemy miscast base chance: +5%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: They say he brings misfortune to those who oppose the throng...

effects.description:
Enemy physical resistance: -2%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Ensuring that your weapon is always in tip-top shape isn’t an easy job. This old-timer knows a couple of handy tricks that will make it simpler, and he’s always willing to share.
Even a dwarf must sometimes admit when they're in the presence of somebody they should be happy to learn from.
Valaya's rune provides the wearer with vigour, and protects all Dawi from corruption.
Blending magic and metalwork, the Runesmith hones armour with greater solidity than items wrought by any other mortal race in the world.

effects.description: Harden Armour action: armour is increased by an additional 3
Harden Armour action: armour is increased by an additional 5

skillTree.localised_description: Perhaps by some gift of Grungni, when a Runesmith feels the rage of battle his throng’s weapons glow with the heat of the forgefires.

effects.description: Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 3%
Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 5%

skillTree.localised_description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.
My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance from battle: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance from battle: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance from battle: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +1 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +3 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +5 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!
We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 4
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.
This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 when fighting against armies that spread corruption
	(own army)

Melee attack: +6 when fighting against armies that spread corruption
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(own armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +25%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Fortunately, this Dawi is just as dedicated to the advancement of his people as he is to drinking his own body weight, and yours, in Bugman's Best every night.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: As a Dawi elder statesman, who has lived long and seen much, this one is one of the most respected figures in his Hold.
Stout and sturdy, as every good Dawi should be.
This Dawi master of the runes can trace his lineage back to Thungni, God of Runic Magic and Runesmithing.

effects.description: Shared cooldown: -10% for all Rune Magic

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Master artisans who utilize their deep understanding of metallurgical techniques to forge powerful runes, a Runesmith is always a welcome sight in a dwarf hold and on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: -50%
	(enemy characters in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Master artisans who utilize their deep understanding of metallurgical techniques to forge powerful runes, a Runesmith is always a welcome sight in a dwarf hold and on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance from battle: +25%
	(accompanying Lord)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Master artisans who utilize their deep understanding of metallurgical techniques to forge powerful runes, a Runesmith is always a welcome sight in a dwarf hold and on the battlefield.

attributes.bullet_text:
This unit is permanently visible to the enemy, regardless of line of sight.
	
	Revealed units are not affected by the following attributes:
	 Hide Forest
	 Stalk
	 Unspottable

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
